bibl.title: Ideologiceskie formy bor'by narodn'ikh mass Egipta s Rimom vo ii-iv vv n.e. Avec résumé en anglais: Ideological Forms taken by the Struggle waged against Rome by the Peoples of Egypt in the Second to Fourth Centuries A.D.
